fullText: The Broadway iteration of 'Six' is a triumphant celebration of sisterhood that cleverly reimagines the wives of Henry VIII as modern-day pop stars.
dtliExcerpt: The Broadway iteration of 'Six' is a triumphant celebration of sisterhood that cleverly reimagines the wives of Henry VIII as modern-day pop stars.
